messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] careful what ya ask  4
messages.msgSnippet: LOL!!! ... From: ladymagic@mchsi.com To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com Sent: Tuesday, August 12, 2003 2:32 PM Subject: [AlwaysLearning] careful what ya ask 4
messages.messageBody:
LOL!!!
----- Original Message -----
From: ladymagic@...
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, August 12, 2003 2:32 PM
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] careful what ya ask 4


I got this in another list made me chuckle thought i would share it here

Each day should start with a smile.......


The Kindergarten teacher was attempting to teach the children to use less baby
talk and more big people words.

When she asked little Johnnie how he spent the weekend, he replied, "I went
to
see my Nana"

"No, Johnnie, you went to see your Grandmother. Remember to use big people
words."

The next child replied to the question with "We went on a ride on a choo-choo!"

"Now, remember to use the big people words. You went for a ride on a train"

The third child proudly announced that he had read a book. "Good for you!
What book did you read?"

"Winnie the shit!"
